DOC.detailed_description: Participants provide ( weekly ) food item contain ( > 90 % ) daily dietary fat ( 25-30 % daily calorie ) consume . All study-supplied food prepare acquire Wake Forest University Health Sciences ( WFUHS ) Clinical Research Unit ( CRU ) Metabolic Kitchen distribute . These food include smoothy ( contain flaxseed oil common arm ) , arm-dependent oil-based condiment ( salad dressing , mayonnaise , margarine ) prepare snack food , make arm-specific oil , well several package snack food item . Participants provide meal plan recipes home preparation meal allow adhere target fatty acid content two dietary arm . The goal dietary intervention provide participant daily fat content diet ( 25-30 % daily calorie ) educate participant select consume balance nutrient ( 60-75 % daily calorie ) derive non-fat/low-fat containing food .
